----

= Informations =

*Download*: The current version includes  2D and 3D programs, some utilities and a visualisation software xadeli. Software packages are available for the 2D code ([WikiSyntax 3p4 release]) and for the 3D code (3d4 release) as zipped tarfiles.

*Operating systems*: Adeli is compiled with Fortran 77 under Linux and can be compiled under other platforms.

*Visualisation*: Xadeli is compiled with c with various X11 librairies under Linux and Unix.

----

= Unix/Linux installation =

  # Create a directory (named X) where you want to install the code;
  # Get the software package;
  # Unshrink the code to get a tarfile;
  # Extract files : tar xvf tarfile_name;
  # Add the paths  X/bin and  X/com in the  \PATH variable (.bashrc or .cshrc or ...).
